task.title: Update Elasticsearch Pipelines
task.shortdesc: version 2.3.0.0 includes an enhanced Elasticsearch destination that uses the Elasticsearch HTTP API. To upgrade pipelines that use the Elasticsearch destination, you must verify that Java 8 is installed and review the value of the Default Operation property.

context.note: The Elasticsearch version 5 stage library is compatible with all versions of Elasticsearch. Earlier stage library versions have been removed.

step.cmd: Verify that Java 8 is installed on the Data Collector machine.

info.p: The minimum supported version of Java for the Elasticsearch destination is Java 8.

step.cmd: Review all upgraded Elasticsearch destinations to ensure that the Default Operation property is set to the correct operation.

info.p:
Upgraded Elasticsearch destinations have the Default Operation property set based on the configuration for the Enable Upsert property:
With upsert enabled, the default operation is set to INDEX.
With upsert not enabled, the default operation is set to CREATE which requires a DocumentId.
